Giorgia Meloni - Prime Minister of Italy - has been named the most influential politician of the coming year by Politico magazine. The editorial forecast is the author's own and indicates a list of European politicians who will determine the direction in which Europe will go. There are positive and negative heroes on it. Politico's "Class of 2025" list also includes four politicians from Poland.

articles.description: The director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation, Christopher Wray, has announced that he will resign at the end of the current administration's term. articles.original_title: Don't miss the "fifth quarter" - how to plan a successful marketing campaign in the post-holiday period?
articles.optimized_title: Don't miss the "fifth quarter" - how to plan a successful marketing campaign in the post-holiday period?
articles.description: The holiday season is a marketing marathon, but experience teaches us that the race does not end at the December finish line. Q5, or the so-called fifth quarter, is ahead of us. The period from late December to mid-January conceals a great deal of untapped potential. Lower media costs and sustained consumer demand (as many as 41% of people continue shopping after the holidays) create ideal conditions for achieving sales success.

articles.optimized_title: Tax relief for returning from abroad. How not to lose it in the last days of the year?
